column4: im having boot problems, i can only get into recovery mode atm. I installed ubuntu with some advanced boot options because i had pci problems. Does anyone know how i can solve these pci device problems?
usually pci devices dont cause problems.. unless there's irq-sharing problems..
how can i tell if there's irq sharing problems
maybe you can take a look here: this is the thread i made, it's more specific with the error: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=11405297#post11405297
